Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous material, exterior covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of at least one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393322) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393322)
